title: All We Want for Christmas is Sound Economics

media:group.media:title: All We Want for Christmas is Sound Economics
media:group.media:description:
What’s red, green, and more polarizing than politics? Hallmark Christmas movies. Some love them for their romantic portrayal of the holidays, while others hate them for their predictability and uninspired storylines. Despite this, there’s a clear takeaway from Hallmark’s recent production, Noel Next Door… value is subjective! Watch this special FEE short for a quick economics lesson through a snowy lens.
